text: For the geographer from Al-Andalus see Mohammed Ibn Abu Bakr al-Zuhri Abu Mus`ab Ahmad ibn Abi Bakr al-Zuhri (292 AH Imaams of the Sunnah: Vanguards of Islamic aqeedah: Taabi’een from the People of Madeenah « IBN AL HYDERABADEE) was a well-known 3rd-century AH Muslim scholar, the son of Ibn Shihab al- Zuhri.Malik ibn Anas ibn Malik ibn `Amr, al-Imam, Abu `Abd Allah al-Humyari al-Asbahi al-Madani ==References== Category:9th-century Muslim scholars of Islam Category:9th-century Arabs
title: Ahmad ibn Abu Bakr al-Zuhri
